mapper.select:
/* com.innobiz.orange.web.ap.dao.ApOngdApvLnDDao.selectApOngdApvLnD */
SELECT
M.*, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM PT_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM PT_CD_B WHERE CLS_CD = 'APV_STAT_CD' AND CD = M.APV_STAT_CD) AND LANG_TYP_CD = IFNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) APV_STAT_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM OR_USER_B WHERE USER_UID = M.AGNT_UID) AND LANG_TYP_CD = IFNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) AGNT_NM,
FROM (
SELECT
T.APV_NO, T.APV_LN_PNO, T.APV_LN_NO, T.APV_LN_HST_NO, T.DBL_APV_TYP_CD, T.APVR_ROLE_CD, T.APV_STAT_CD, T.ABS_RSON_CD, T.ABS_RSON_NM, T.APVR_DEPT_YN, T.PICH_APNT_YN, T.PRED_YN, T.AGNT_UID, T.APVR_UID, T.APVR_NM, T.APVR_POSIT_CD, T.APVR_POSIT_NM, T.APVR_TITLE_CD, T.APVR_TITLE_NM, T.APV_DEPT_ID, T.APV_DEPT_NM, T.APV_DEPT_ABBR_NM, T.POSIT_DISP_VA, T.SIGN_DISP_VA, T.DT_DISP_VA, T.SIGN_IMG_PATH, DATE_FORMAT(T.VW_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') VW_DT, DATE_FORMAT(T.APV_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') APV_DT, DATE_FORMAT(T.PREV_APVR_APV_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') PREV_APVR_APV_DT, T.APV_OPIN_CONT, T.APV_OPIN_DISP_YN, T.PREV_BODY_HST_NO, T.HOLD_BODY_HST_NO, T.PREV_APV_LN_HST_NO, T.HOLD_APV_LN_HST_NO, T.PREV_ATT_HST_NO, T.HOLD_ATT_HST_NO, T.PREV_RECV_DEPT_HST_NO, T.HOLD_RECV_DEPT_HST_NO, T.PREV_REF_DOC_HST_NO, T.HOLD_REF_DOC_HST_NO, T.FIXD_APVR_YN,
(SELECT RESC_VA FROM PT_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM PT_CD_B WHERE CLS_CD = 'APV_STAT_CD' AND CD = T.APV_STAT_CD) AND LANG_TYP_CD = IFNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) APV_STAT_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM OR_USER_B WHERE USER_UID = T.AGNT_UID) AND LANG_TYP_CD = IFNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) AGNT_NM,
FROM AP_${storage}_APV_LN_${tableType} T
AND T.APV_NO = #{apvNo, jdbcType=BIGINT} AND T.APV_LN_PNO = #{apvLnPno, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND T.APV_LN_NO = #{apvLnNo, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND T.APV_LN_HST_NO = #{apvLnHstNo, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND T.DBL_APV_TYP_CD = #{dblApvTypCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.APVR_ROLE_CD = #{apvrRoleCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.APVR_DEPT_YN = #{apvrDeptYn, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.APVR_UID = #{apvrUid, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.APV_DEPT_ID = #{apvDeptId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.APVR_ROLE_CD IN ( #{item, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) AND T.APV_STAT_CD IN ( #{item, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) AND APV_LN_NO >= #{nextApvLnNo, jdbcType=INTEGER} ${whereSqllet}
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ORDER BY T.APV_NO, T.APV_LN_PNO, T.APV_LN_NO
LIMIT #{pageStrt, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} ) M
